ComicInfo.Summary:
Spinning directly out of the epic RED SONJA title written by MARK RUSSELL!
The end. Prince Cyril has lived a full, magical life. He is ready. He will kill Red Sonja.
By MARK RUSSELL (Red Sonja, Year Of The Villain), BRYCE INGMAN (Edgar Allen Poeâ€™s Snifter Of Terror) and CRAIG ROUSSEAU (The Flash).
